frames.caption: A joyful child rides on the back of a majestic lion, arms raised in excitement. The scene is set in a sunlit street, capturing a moment of fantasy and adventure.
frames.description: The image depicts a child riding a lion through a vibrant, sunlit street. The child is visibly thrilled, with a wide smile and arms stretched out in exhilaration, while the lion strides forward confidently.

frames.caption: A joyful child rides on the back of a majestic lion through a bustling city street. The child, with arms raised in excitement, exudes pure delight as the lion strides confidently forward. The scene is vibrant and dynamic, capturing a sense of adventure and wonder.
frames.description: The image depicts a surreal and fantastical scene where a child is riding a lion through an urban setting. The background shows a blurred cityscape with people and buildings, suggesting a lively and busy environment.

summary: People: child. Animals: lion. Objects: buildings, street. Actions: riding, running, walking. Emotions: joy, excitement. Scenes: urban, fantasy. Concepts: adventure, imagination, wonder
